descriptionHtml:
I have been working on doing my own nude texture for females after being a little bit disappointed of what has been floating around so far.

It is still a WORK IN PROGRESS and I used assets from the Natural Bodies mod for Dragon Age. I am only applying the textures onto the Skyrim ones and adjusting them (since the UV mapping is completely different).

I am aware of some of the color/gradient/seams problems and I will continue working on them.

[b]Installation:[/b]
Unpack in Data folder - You will need to get the mesh from somewhere else! This is only the texture file.

[b]Uninstall:[/b]
Remove these files from <skyrim folder>\\data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\

femalebody.dds
femalebody_1.dds
femalebody_1_msn.dds
femalebody_1_s.dds
femalebody_1_sk.dds
femalebody_msn.dds
femalebody_s.dds
femalebody_sk.dds

[b]Changelog:[/b]
0.0.2:
Improved seams and color gradients. Still not perfect but getting there.
Also improved the nipple placing. Please give some feedback.
Saved in uncompressed format for better quality.

0.0.1:
Initial Release

[b]Credits:[/b]
http://www.dragonagenexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=554 - The DA mod where I am using the textures from.
NewByPower, adriangi, Rebel o Conner, Horrid, Gray, Altorian and mutantspicy
author: xwcg
